categories: Category:Alliance to Restore the Republic members

nodes.text: Murell was a member of the Rebel Alliance who worked as a tauntaun handler at the Alliance's Echo Base on the planet Hoth. Due to the limited number of handlers, Murell's rotation prevented the handler from having time to both visit the mess hall and get enough sleep. As a result, Murell and the other handlers were supported by food runs from other personnel. One day, in 3 ABY, the runner Chase Wilsorr delivered food and caf to Murell and fellow handlers Baesoon and Jordan Smythe during their shifts at the tauntaun pens. Murell took a share of the delivery gratefully.
Murell appeared in the short story "A Good Kiss," written by C.B. Lee as a part of the 2020 short story collection From a Certain Point of View: The Empire Strikes Back.
